```
 Customer
      |---->Merchant
             |----> Payment processor (helps the
                     |  merchant deal with the
                     |  payment protocol)
                     |
                     |-->Acquiring bank (merchant's)
                            |-->Association network
                                  | (e.g., Visa)
                                  |
                                  |---> Issuing bank
                                        (customer's) 
```
